targets.query:
perc = () => {
instrumented = from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range(start:-1h)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  
r._measurement == "inspectit_self_instrumented_classes" AND  
r.service == "$service" AND  
r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])


loaded = from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range(start:-1h)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  
r._measurement == "jvm_classes_loaded" AND  
r.service == "$service" AND  
r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])


return join(tables:{instrumented:instrumented, loaded:loaded},on:["_time"])
|> map(fn:(r) => ({
_time: r._time,
_value: (r._value_instrumented / r._value_loaded),
_measurement: "perc-instrumented"    }))
|> last()
}

perc()

panels.description: Number of newly logged errors. This metric can display too low numbers in case the agent just restarted!
panels.title: Errors

targets.query:
perc = () => {
instrumented = from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range(start:-1h)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  
r._measurement == "inspectit_self_instrumentation_analysis_queue_size" AND  
r.service == "$service" AND  
r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])


loaded = from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range(start:-1h)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  
r._measurement == "jvm_classes_loaded" AND  
r.service == "$service" AND  
r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])


return join(tables:{instrumented:instrumented, loaded:loaded},on:["_time"])
|> map(fn:(r) => ({
_time: r._time,
_value: 1.0 - (r._value_instrumented / r._value_loaded),
_measurement: "progress"    }))
|> last()
}

perc()

panels.description: Number of newly logged warnings. This metric can display too low numbers in case the agent just restarted!
panels.title: Warnings

panels.description: Number of newly logged infos. This metric can display too low numbers in case the agent just restarted!
panels.title: Other Logs
